thread.title: Tanisha Campbell
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Tanisha Campbell

author: Tanisha Campbell
title: Tanisha Campbell
text: The furniture is nice and comfy for a great price! I got a love seat, sofa, dresser, queen bed, mattress, box spring, dining room table, and 4 chairs all for $1000 just like it was advertised! I will be going back in the future If I need more furniture!
